original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color>$Skill_CD(2371)@  全體我方武將恢復13%最大體力，並在接下來的$Status_duration(1616)@秒內，每兩秒回復110點體力。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color>$Skill_CD(2371)@ All our generals recover 13% of their maximum physical strength, and in the next $Status_duration(1616)@ seconds, reply 110 every two seconds Physical strength.
